attributes.review: I downloaded this app to make America great again. What I got instead were Chinese viruses on my phone and laptop!!!! This app is hacked by the Chinese government help

attributes.review: It comes from CHINA not the USA.  I have the iPhone with huge storage and it took up all of it. I feel threatened. Can’t even save pics of my grandson Billy. Don’t download.
attributes.title: BEEWARE CHINA MALWARE
